description: Contextual Tooltips - Hover-based information overlays on all interactive UI elements explaining stats, bonuses, costs, and shortcuts.

userStories.title: Implement reusable tooltip directive
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a reusable tooltip directive so that tooltips can be added to any element.
acceptanceCriteria: A TooltipDirective is implemented as a standalone Angular directive
Supports string content and TemplateRef for rich content
Tooltip appears on mouseenter after 300ms delay
Tooltip disappears on mouseleave
Tooltip positioning avoids viewport edges (auto-repositions)
Unit tests verify tooltip show/hide behavior
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement tooltip styling and consistency
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a consistent tooltip style so that all tooltips feel cohesive.
acceptanceCriteria: All tooltips use a shared CSS class with consistent background, border, font, shadow
Tooltips support a title line (bold) and body text
Rich tooltips support sections with dividers
Tooltip max width prevents overly wide tooltips
Tooltips readable against all game backgrounds
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add resource tooltips with production breakdown
userStories.description: As a player, I want tooltips on resource displays showing production rates and sources.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering a resource shows: current amount, max storage, net production per minute
Production breakdown lists each source room and its contribution
Consumption sources listed
Net positive in green, net negative in red
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add room tooltips
userStories.description: As a player, I want tooltips on rooms showing stats without opening a detail panel.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering a room shows: name, type, level, inhabitant count/capacity
Production values with modifiers displayed
Fear and Corruption values shown
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add inhabitant tooltips
userStories.description: As a player, I want tooltips on inhabitants showing stats and assignment.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering an inhabitant shows: name, type, level, HP, assigned room
Combat stats displayed if applicable
Current activity (working, idle, fighting) shown
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add cost tooltips with affordability
userStories.description: As a player, I want tooltips on cost displays showing affordability status.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering a cost indicator shows each resource required and current availability
Resources player has enough of shown in green
Resources player lacks shown in red with deficit amount
Total affordability clearly indicated
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add keyboard shortcut tooltips
userStories.description: As a player, I want tooltips on buttons to include keyboard shortcuts.
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons with keyboard shortcuts show the shortcut in tooltip
Shortcut text styled distinctly (monospace or badge)
Shortcuts are accurate and match actual key bindings
Tooltips without shortcuts don't show empty shortcut areas
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
